ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Five: Universal Monster
ComicInfo.Summary:
EL is alone in the world, pursued closely by some who wish to protect him, some who wish to harm him, and some who are simply doing a job. As regular citizens react to the monster in their midst, EL begins to reconsider his choices, wondering if he should have stayed with Mateoâ€”or sought a more permanent form of escape.
